Previous: pat2Next: pad

√path (?) 'go'

present: [1.] páthati etc.  

[perfect: papātha  apathīt  pathiṣyati  pathitā  ]

secondary: causative: pāthayati  

derivatives: páth V.+  pánthā V.  páthan- B.  pā́thas V.+  pā́this B.  

No real root; the present forms doubtless bad readings for patati etc.; the causative a denominative of the stem path.
